headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https: fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https: fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https: data:; base-uri 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https: webpack:; upgrade-insecure-requests
headers.Feature-Policy: accelerometer 'none'; autoplay 'none'; camera 'none'; fullscreen 'self'; geolocation 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; microphone 'none'; midi 'none'; payment 'none'; speaker 'self'; sync-xhr 'self'; usb 'none'; vr 'none'
headers.X-Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https: fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https: fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https: data:; base-uri 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https: webpack:; upgrade-insecure-requests
headers.X-WebKit-CSP: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https: fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https: fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https: data:; base-uri 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https: webpack:; upgrade-insecure-requests
